name: Skin-changer
text:
Whenever you move 1 or more spaces, you may first change your form and gain one of the following bonuses for as long as you remain in that form:
Wolf: You ignore enemy guards. This includes when making an attack which causes you to revert to your regular form.
Stag: You gain 1 speed and suffer a -1 natural armor penalty.
Bear: Your unarmed attacks gain 1 bonus die as long as you're wounded.

If you perform a weapon attack, you first revert to your regular form.
